Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: Uschi
Reviews.Content: This product fixed the issue I had with a rolling video picture from my DVR/Security Cameras. It fixed the issue the very second I installed it!

Reviews.Title: Interfearance lines on my cctv
Reviews.Author: Mnw6
Reviews.Content: I Brought this product to remove the lines (noise) that appeared on the tvScreen from my cctv but it has not worked it's exactlyThe same so very disappointing back to the drawring board !

ProductInfo.Features:
BNC male to BNC female in/output
Connects directly to the BNC connector on a camera or video device
Passive type, no power needed
Reduce ground loop interference with CCTV signals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Passive BNC Video Ground Loop Isolator Noise Filter for CCTV Security Camera Surveillance System 1MU
